column2: Hunger Strikes the Fastness under Siege
Food smuggled in lengthens the Siege
I need to decide if I should lead the assault
The defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! successfully raided the camps of the besiegers, inflicting heavy casualties.
The defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! launched an unsuccessful raid against the besiegers, taking heavy losses in the attempt.
The defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! executed captives on the wall, angering the besiegers and strengthening their resolve.
Rumors of a traitor working with the besiegers has eroded the morale of the defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!.
An outbreak of disease in the camps outside the walls of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! has killed many of the besiegers.
Large numbers of the famished defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! have succumbed to starvation.
Food and supplies have been smuggled into §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, increasing the morale of the defenders.
Bandits have raided the siege camps outside §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, killing many of the besieging soldiers.
Tuscan raiders have attacked the siege camps outside §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, killing many of the besieging soldiers.
Encouraged by a holy omen, the emboldened Christian defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! caused havoc on the pagan siege lines in a daring raid.
After finding a holy relic, the emboldened Christian defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! caused havoc on the Muslim siege lines in a daring raid.
A Sufi mystic has heartened the Muslim defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, and they have inflicted severe losses on the besieging infidels.
The fortress of the infidel has not fallen. It's up to me to lead the charge for God, Jesus and the Holy Ghost!
The enemy is near and I know what is ahead. Today would be a good day to die!
Tuscan raiders have attacked the siege camps outside §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, but they were startled by a surprise counter attack.
The Christian commander besieging our fortress has taken it upon himself to personally lead the assault against our walls! His mad dash forward caught our brave defenders by surprise!
The enemy has launched a massive assault against our besieged fortress! Our forces were caught unprepared!
As enemy soldiers stream into the room, I have no choice but to surrender. I am at the mercy of [New.GetTitledName].
After a successful siege, your men drag §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! out of [From.GetHerHis] hiding hole.
They will be back in greater numbers.
Lead the assault from the first line
Order the assault to commence, while staying behind
